mapper.select: SELECT no, name, post_count AS postCount, content FROM category WHERE blog_no = #{blogNo}
SELECT no, title, content, reg_date AS regDate, category_no AS categoryNo FROM post WHERE no = #{no}

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS no, title, content, reg_date AS regDate, category_no AS categoryNo FROM post, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE blog_no = #{blogNo} AND category_no = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT b.no, b.title, b.image_path imagePath FROM blog b, user u WHERE b.no = u.no AND u.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog VALUES( #{userNo}, null, null, null )
INSERT INTO post VALUES( null, #{categoryNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{blogNo} )

INSERT INTO category VALUES( null, #{name}, 0, #{content}, #{blogNo} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
